definitions.example: A former president;  the former East Germany

definitions.definition: First of aforementioned two items. Used with the, often without a noun.
definitions.example: I drive two vehicles, a Chevy Camaro and an AMC Gremlin. I won the former on a game show.

definitions.definition: Someone who forms something; a maker; a creator or founder.
definitions.example: Dave was the former of the company.

definitions.definition: An object used to form something, such as a template, gauge, or cutting die.
definitions.example: The brick arch was built using a wooden former.

definitions.definition: (used in combinations) Someone in, or of, a certain form (class).
